Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Nika Island Resort & Spa in Kudafolhudhoo (North Ari Atoll), you'll be minutes from Kudafolhudhoo Harbor and close to Mathiveri Harbor. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of Mathiveri Ferry Terminal and Sunset Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 44 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a steam room and a fitness center. This resort also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and an arcade/game room.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this resort. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Nika Island Resort & Spa. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a beach bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, multilingual staff, and laundry facilities.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this resort. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Nika Island Resort & Spa. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a beach bar.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a steam room and a fitness center. This resort also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and an arcade/game room.
Make yourself at home in one of the 44 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

With a stay at Nika Island Resort & Spa in Kudafolhudhoo (North Ari Atoll), you'll be minutes from Kudafolhudhoo Harbor and close to Mathiveri Harbor. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of Mathiveri Ferry Terminal and Sunset Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kudafolhudhoo Harbor - 0 km / 0 mi
Mathiveri Harbor - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Mathiveri Ferry Terminal - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Sunset Beach - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Ukulhas Harbor - 11.3 km / 7 mi
Ukulhas Beach - 11.3 km / 7 mi
Maaya Thila - 14.1 km / 8.8 mi
Gaathafushi Island - 18.2 km / 11.3 mi
Fesdu House Reef - 19.7 km / 12.3 mi
Malhoss Thila - 21 km / 13 mi
Holi Faru Dive Site - 25 km / 15.5 mi
Rasdhoo Reef Dive Site - 26 km / 16.2 mi
Adivaru Thila Dive Site - 26.9 km / 16.7 mi
Madivaru Corner Dive Site - 27.2 km / 16.9 mi
Big Blue Dive Site - 27.4 km / 17 mi

The preferred airport for Nika Island Resort & Spa is Male (MLE-Male Intl.) - 84.2 km / 52.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Message.Text:
Room No: 1

Included in booking cost -
Green Tax USD 48.00
ALL-INCLUSIVE MEAL PLAN
The following services are available for guests staying on ALL-INCLUSIVE meal plan.
(All Inclusive subject to minimum of 4 nights or more)

1. Food & Beverages: All drinks served by glass on at a time.
•Water: Water is served without time restrictions
•Tea & Coffee & Wine (house wine only) & Beer
•Sparkling Wine: selected sparkling wine served by glass
•Soft drinks/Fruit juice: Fresh fruit juices are at extra charges
•Spirit (Gin, Vodka, Rum,Brandy & Whiskey): Premium brands of spirits are at an extra charge
•Selected Cocktail ( Only served at the Main Bar and Beach Bar)
• Main Bar: (all-inclusive service available) from 11:00 AM until 01:00 AM
• Beach Bar/Coffee shop: (all-inclusive service available) from 08:30 AM until 09:00 PM
• Restaurant Bar: (all-inclusive service available) during meal times.
All drinks are served oen glass at a time.
Mini Bar is not including in the all-inclusive package except water use.

2. Sports/Entertainments:
•All non-motorized water sport - Complimentary two hours per person per day, courses and lessons are with additional charges
•Volleyball/Futsal
•Snorkeling - One guided snorkeling tour around at Nika Reef per guest per stay
•Local Island Experience - One excursion per person per stay
•Snorkeling equipment’s rental - Free of charge during the stay

, 3. Limitations
•The All-inclusive package does not include the following:
•Food & beverages not listed above and beverages served from 11:00 PM to 10:00 AM
•Food & beverages served in the room and all drinks from the mini-bar except water

4. All-Inclusive Meal Plan Policies and Procedures
•All types of beverages are for the personal consumption only, served one glass as a time, ordered at the Main Bar, Beach Bar, Coffee Shop or Restaurant Bar.
•Beverages (alcoholic and non-alcoholic can be ordered one at a time and not in advance.
•The resort cannot be held responsible for the facilities, services that cannot be used due to weather conditions or due to circumstances beyond the property's control.
•Our procedure requires billing for all consumption of food and beverages as well as for all other services. All quests are required to sign in the bills that are presented after any service provided.
•The benefit of the package can be enjoyed from 02:00 PM on the guest arrival date until check-out time of 12:00 PM and in case the transfer gets delayed or advanced due to transfer scheduling that the clients cannot claim for.
•All-inclusive food/drinks can’t be taken away from bars or restaurant.
,HONEYMOON OFFERS
All Honeymooners will receive:
A cake and a bottle of sparkling wine upon arrival per the stay.
•Valid year round, Six Month from the Married date (Minimum Four Nights)
•This offer is subject to information at the time of reservation and presentation of a copy of either wedding certificate, invitation card or other Reasonable proof of recent marriage.
Please contact the property directly for more information.

,•Due to the tax regulation, all guests are committed to the green tax surcharge of USD 6 per person. The tax for infants is not included in the property reservation cost and will be collected by the property upon check-in.
•When booking more than 5 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.
, •Transfer Notice
From November 1, 2018 to October 31, 2020
Type of Transfer: Seaplane
Adult (12 years old and above): USD 410
Child (2-11 years old): USD 205
Infant (Below 2 years old): Complimentary

In order to reach the property on the same day, guests must arrive on the international flight before 03:00 PM. Transfer rates are subject to change without prior notice. Please contact the property directly for more information.


No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
